about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what your feline companions do when you're away?

Well, we have the answer. They are busy fulfilling their missions as part of the Spy Cats agency. In this casual 2D platformer game, you'll get a sneak peek into the secret lives of our favorite feline friends.

So, what's the objective of the game?

Your task is simple - collect an artifact while dodging enemies and traps. Use spy gadgets you unlock to sneak through each mission, retrieve the artifact, and make a successful escape. If you manage to accomplish your goal, you'll receive a reward. As you unlock more gadgets be sure to return to previous missions to uncover hidden secrets.

Be A Part of Spy Cats!

Join us in the early stages of Spy Cats' development! Follow the game for updates on new features or join us during early access and share your valuable feedback to help us create a paw-some game. In the future, we're hoping to add achievements, a gallery filled with concept art, and a speedrun leaderboard. While these features may be a ways off, we're excited to work towards making them a reality.
